author: r-darwish
body:
## Summary of the new feature/enhancement

Unix shell usually have an [exec](https://ss64.com/bash/exec.html) command which calls the [exec](https://linux.die.net/man/3/exec) system call. It would be nice to have that in Powershell as well.

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: This might be a duplicate of #12750? 🤔

comments.author: r-darwish
comments.body: Seems so. Sorry for the duplicate.

title: Implement the exec command on Unix systems
